articles.title: Swedish Telecom Equipment Maker Ericsson To Cut 8,500 Jobs Worldwide - NDTV
articles.description: Swedish telecom equipment maker Ericsson said Friday it would cut 8,500 jobs worldwide as part of a cost-cutting programme.
articles.content:
It is done in a bid to render the company "more efficient".
Stockholm: Telecom equipment maker Ericsson said Friday it would slash 8,500 jobs worldwide, part of a cost-cutting programme as financial… [+1280 chars]
